document_data.name: Helmgrove
document_data.mainbody: '''Helmgrove''' was a wooded area north of the city of [[Myth Drannor]]. It is most notable for its use as a watchpost by the [[Shield of Myth Drannor]], in the events leading up to the [[Weeping War|Fall of Myth Drannor]]. It no longer exists and its exact location has been lost.
